mapper.insert: insert into `transaction_record`(cardno, transaction_date, expense, income, `balance`, transaction_type) values (#{cardNo}, #{transactionDate}, #{expense}, #{income}, #{balance}, #{transactionType});
mapper.select: select id, cardno, transaction_date, expense, income, balance, transaction_type, remark from transaction_record
